refnamediv.refpurpose: How to know if an argument or a variable is stored as a matrix.

listitem.para: Scilab environment pointer, pass in "pvApiCtx" provided by api_scilab.h
1 if the variable is stored as matrix otherwise 0.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This help describes how to know if a variable is stored as a matrix.
In some cases (exemple: list), a variable is not stored as a standard Scilab matrix. This function provides a way to handle both cases.
